name: Scout's Honour (Sherilynne Herb)
description:
Scout’s Honour is a 3D first-person prototype with aspects of survival, exploration, and simulation. This has been created in collaboration with Sherilynne Herb and Nhlanganiso Tshabangu for a University submission in 2021. Players take on the role of a wilderness guide intern, who has to survive long enough to complete all required objectives in order to qualify as an official Wilderness Guide.

Download the folder, unzip and click on the .exe file to play the game.
